title: Dance of the shells = Tanz der muscheln
brief_description: The many shaped and many textured world of shells from all over the oceans is observed under changing lights and in varied patterns of movement. The accompanying music is composed of electronically produced sound. Beautifully photographed and dramatically lit - a very striking film.
